alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 3:28PM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Dukes and Nantucket Counties. In Rhode Island, Block Island. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of wind gusts to 50 mph is expected this evening, then winds will drop off overnight and Sunday morning. Another surge of strong wind gusts to 50 mph is expected Sunday afternoon into early evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
